content:
The error message says that the "omw-1.4" corpus is not found in the NLTK data directory. You can fix this by downloading the "omw-1.4" corpus using `nltk.download('omw-1.4')`.

Try running the following code to download the corpus and then rerun your code:
```python
import nltk
nltk.download('omw-1.4')
```
